div.bibl: Yakov Starik, A History of the Industrial Workers of the World, Chicago: Executive Committee, Russian Section, I. W. W., 1921, p. 197.

body.p: "The wave of immigration to Russia is decreasing the number of the Russian Industrialists, but those remaining are continuing to work, and we are convinced that the work of Russian Industrial Workers of the World, for a complete emancipation of the workers from the slave system and the establishment of an industrial democracy, will only cease when not a single Russian Industrialist is left in America."
